data.name: NFTCircle
data.description:
NFTCircle offers a new generation of NFT through AR by Toppan Tabitori and visual art under ARTMYN for the art ecosystem. Its vision is to HOME of the AR and visual ART NFT.

How do we do it?
we have our inhouse blockchain development Tradetrust that is recognized for documents security by Singapore government. Together with Artmyn scanning technology, any physical art piece protected by veriSECURE technology (designed by veriTAG on blockchain track and trace with  IOT - temperature and location) stored in a 3rd party insured warehouse can become a NFT that can be traded anywhere           
veriTAG is strategic partner with Toppan and through the collaboration, focus on developing Tabitori, an AR characters platform and with support from Toppan, will be able to gain access to Japan IP and Japan market.
nftcircle (NFTC) is based on the NRC20 Token issued by the NULS main network. It can be freely circulated across multiple chains in NULS multi-chain network. It will be the governance points certificate of the nftcircle.io platform. The 40% commission generated by the platform will be used to purchased back the NFTS. These purchased NFTS will be destroyed to increase the scarcity of the token.
Development and maintenance: 
15%, 150 million
locked for 2 years after the platform is online 

Operational development: 
30%, 300 million
locked for 2 years after the platform is online 

Liquidity mining: 
20%,200 million
Locked for 3 years, whereupon 1 Billion, followed by 600 million and finally 400 million will be released 

Transaction mining: 
10%, 100 million
According to the platform's NFT asset transaction, the buyer will be rewarded based on the transaction amount. 

Institutional investment: 
20%, 200 million 
Locked for one year after the platform goes live 

Market airdrop: 
5%, 50 million
